titleStmt.title: The diocesans tryall Wherein all the sinnews of D. Dovvnames Defence are brought unto three heads, and orderly dissolved. By M. Paul Baynes.
titleStmt.author: Baynes, Paul, d. 1617.

notesStmt.note: An answer to: Downame, George. A defence of the sermon preached at the consecration of the L. Bishop of Bath and Welles, against a confutation thereof by a namelesse author.
Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
A post-1640 reprint falsely dated 1621 has "Published by Dr. William Amis" on the title page.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
